    MainMenuView - Class in application.view
    The main menu view with Start, Settings, and Exit buttons.

    Constructs the main menu view with title, subtitle, and action buttons.
    maxHealth - Variable in class application.model.boss.Boss
    Maximum health points.
    MENU - Enum constant in enum class application.model.GameState
    Main menu is displayed; no game threads are running.
    MINIMUM_GRAVITY_MS - Static variable in class application.util.Config
    Minimum gravity interval (hard floor) in milliseconds.
    moveDown() - Method in class application.model.tetromino.Tetromino
    Moves the piece one row down.
    moveLeft() - Method in class application.model.tetromino.Tetromino
    Moves the piece one column to the left.
    moveRight() - Method in class application.model.tetromino.Tetromino
    Moves the piece one column to the right.
    moveUp() - Method in class application.model.tetromino.Tetromino
    Moves the piece one row up (used to undo a moveDown on collision).
